title: Modular Construction of Cut-free Sequent Calculi for Paraconsistent Logics.
abstract: This paper makes a substantial step towards automatization of Para consistent reasoning by providing a general method for a systematic and modular generation of cut-free calculi for thousands of Para consistent logics known as Logics of Formal (In)consistency. The method relies on the use of non-deterministic semantics for these logics.
